name: Turkey Lettuce Wraps
preparation: In a large bowl, combine seasoning and water. Using your hands, crumble in turkey and mix well. Press into Rectangular Steamer. Cover and microwave on high for 6–8 min.
Meanwhile, peel and dice sweet potato, chop tomato, and slice avocado.
Remove turkey from steamer and place on cutting board.
Rinse steamer; add sweet potatoes. Cover; microwave on high 4–6 min.
To serve, portion meat in lettuce leaves and top with sweet potatoes, tomatoes, and avocado. Serve salsa on top, if desired.
tips: Refrigerate cooked turkey up to 3 days. Slice, then pan fry until crispy.
Swap ground turkey for ground soy round or pureed lentils.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 1⁄2 cup sliced vegetables and 1 tbsp favourite Epicure dip.
